EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-12-Field-East-ESB-New-York.Marketing Invite 3.On Behalf of Gary Rein
EmailTemplate.subject: See You In New York? Rangers vs Hurricanes - March 12th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
How are IT executives like you accelerating business growth and tackling challenges of scale in the hybrid cloud? Find out on March 12th during an exclusive cocktail hour and presentation by Gary Reiner(former CIO of GE and Operating Partner at General Atlantic) hosted by Cisco, AppDynamics, and Turbonomic at the Cisco NYC office. Following our discussions we'll head to Madison Square Garden for food, drinks, and hockey as the New York Rangers take on the Carolina Hurricanes in our private suite.
Executive Networking Series New York Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud New York Rangers vs Carolina Hurricanes Monday, March 12th | Cisco NYC | 4:00 p.m.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork]]>
Will we see you there? Save your seat by registering here: http://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]>
- The Turbonomic Team
